thread.title: Sean McVay is uniting the Rams front office with pizza
thread.title_full: Sean McVay is uniting the Rams front office with pizza

title: Sean McVay is uniting the Rams front office with pizza
text:
Sean McVay is uniting the Rams front office with pizza Sean McVay is uniting the Rams front office with pizza By Tanya Ray Fox 7 hours ago 278 shares By: Tanya Ray Fox | 7 hours ago Being named the youngest head coach in the NFL may present its challenges for Sean McVay, but he clearly knows how to make a first impression because there’s no better way to win over a coworker than via the power pizza. 
Oh Monday, the 31-year-old coach of the Los Angeles Rams held a pizza party to meet and greet with the team’s front office staff. Sean McVay joins the Rams front office staff for an informal pizza party to meet and greet with his new organization. pic.twitter.com/GCnMnf7JYL 
— Dani Klupenger (@daniklup) January 30, 2017 
Now I’m not saying that pizza has the power to bring everyone together, but there aren’t many people that I wouldn’t hang out with over a slice of pineapple and bacon. More Latest Rams news!
